testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name and last name....................................passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email field.................................................passed And user fills Password fields..............................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with Invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@exampleeee.com" and "P@ssw0rd".................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | user login and change currency
testcase.name: user change currency
testcase.system-out: When user change currency to euro...........................................passed Then Verify euro sign will be displayed in the 4 products on home page......passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name
user could search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: When user search on "laptop"...............................................passed Then Verify URL.............................................................passed And verify each result contains the search word.............................passed

testcase.name: user could search using product name 3
user could search using SKU

testcase.name: user could search using SKU 2
testcase.system-out: Given user search with "APPLE_CAM"..........................................passed When user clicks on the product.............................................passed And verify result contains the search word..................................passed

testcase.name: user could search using SKU 3
testcase.system-out: Given user search with "SF_PRO_11"..........................................passed When user clicks on the product.............................................passed And verify result contains the search word..................................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | user clicks on random subcategory

testcase.system-out: Given user hoovers on random category.......................................passed And click on subcategory....................................................passed Then Subcategory page open successfully and with same selectedsubcategory title.passed
